DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to find a new therapeutic strategy by investigating the serial serum samples of patients with sepsis or postresuscitation state.
DOC.brief_title: Repository for Sepsis and Postresuscitation Samples
DOC.criteria: Age over 16 years old Admitted to ICU Diagnosed as having sepsis or as postresuscitation status Definition of sepsis: 2 or more SIRS criteria + infection is suspected Definition of postresuscitation status: Survived from nontraumatic cardiac arrest refusal to participate DNAR status
